Package db

package db
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    DBConnectionDetails
    The DBConnectionDetails class is an entity of the required data in order to be able to connect the database.
    DBController
    The DB Controller class is the way our application "talk" with the database.
    EmployeeQuery
     
    ManagersQuery
    Handles SQL queries related to various reports and user management tasks.
    OrderQuery
     
    QueryControl
     
    ReportGenerator
    ReportGenerator is responsible for generating various reports (Orders, Performance, Income) and running periodically to check and generate reports on a specific day of the month.
    ServerUtilsQueries
     
    SupplierQuery
     
    UserQuery
    Provides methods to interact with user-related data in the database.
